thread.title: Broad Street Line partially suspended after person fatally hit by train
thread.title_full: Broad Street Line partially suspended after person fatally hit by train

author: Emily Babay
title: Broad Street Line partially suspended after person fatally hit by train
text:
Broad Street Line partially suspended after person fatally hit by train Updated: February 22, 2017 — 8:02 AM EST 1 Share 
Emily Babay is a breaking news producer. She writes about everything from crime to transit problems — 
Service in both directions on the subway line is suspended between the Walnut-Locust and AT& 
Meanwhile, SEPTA's other subway route, the Market-Frankford Line, was running normally Wednesday after a Tuesday derailment February 22, 2017 — 7:51 AM EST | Commenting policy Comment policy:
